text: "She's Got a Way" is a 1971 debut single by Billy Joel and originally released from his debut studio album Cold Spring Harbour. It is better known as a live version from his 1981 album Songs in the Attic. It went to number 23 in the United States and number 46 in Canada in early 1982. == References == Category:1972 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Debut singles Category:Billy Joel songs
title: She's Got a Way
